name: Knockback Knockout
description:
Knockback Knockout is a 2D online party game where 2-6 players compete in various game modes to claim bragging rights as the ultimate champion.

But there’s a twist…
This is not a traditional shooter - you must use your weapon to not only shoot at other players, but also to make your way around the map using recoil mechanics!

    Invite your friends and challenge them to various game modes - some you've heard of, some new:
          Deathmatch
          Floor is Lava
          Recoil Race
          Crown Control
          One in the Chamber
          Pass the bullet
    Choose from a roster of colorful characters, each with their own unique set of abilities to knock other players around
    Rack up points, and become the ultimate knock-knock champion

Jump in, have fun and Knock yourself out!*

*Not literally though - that means you’ll lose.
